creator: anders@norrbring.biz
text:
I have a system where volumes are mounted in the Apache's http docs tree from 
a NetWare server.
I use ncpfs-2.2.0.19 to mount these volumes into linux.

Let's say my documents root is /home and I mount a NetWare volume 
in /home/files.

Then I try to get Apache to both show and send files from this dir, no luck.  
The file names does not show up at all.

I got a work-around from the author of ncpfs (Petr Vandrovec) that is a 
sendfile.so that I load early in the startup script for Apache.

This works, but still no files larger than 2GB are available.

Apache 2.0.44 will include both the EnableSendfile Off and EnableMMAP Off
  directives.  Use both from the <Directory /foo/htdocs/manual> mount that
  you mentioned, with that version, and this problem will be resolved.
